title: Helen005
author: Helen005
content: Let's join hands with osacarswap swap in it's  journey to revolutize crypto economy. Having the back of Arbitrum block chain oscar swap is taking the world by storm through high speed and less cost. Over the years I had lost my investments due to many reasons and I am glad that oscar has been perfect in curving these issues. Let's talk about the gems osacar is incorporating in itself.The most influential thing oscar swap has done is creating a new version of Dex making an arbitrage free environment where user can enjoy fair prices.what an idea to make a user Dex and trader at the same time . Every single thing I ln osacar is user friendly.If you are a yield field person then dont wait for a minute go and invest for varied returnsNot interested in anything staking or yieldfarms?? Then go and avail the opportunity of trading pool assests in open marketHave you ever thought about your potential?? I hope no because nothing has been done on crypto to unlock the potential of its users but not this time , oscar swap has collaborated with L2 to provide its users unlimited access for investments and inventions No more security threat because 24 hour time lock is here so come on add some excitement to your day Who are you premier or adjustable staker?? Check it out what is best for youI am going to be super rich in a year just by investing an Oscar token  at 50 percent APY that will be worth hundred dollars after a year

comments.author: Ojima-ojo
comments.body: Fine, even though the project you want to promote has 100% potential to make a big multiple price increase when launched, it doesn't warrant you making such a big statement in your title because at first the thought that came into my mind when I first read the headline was that this is another Ponzi scheme that only promises x return on investment but on the long run it will fail to meet our promises.So due to the above-mentioned points, what makes your project different from that Ponzi scheme because they also promise such a return just as you did?

comments.author: Mpamaegbu
comments.body: Quote from: Helen005 on May 30, 2023, 09:57:59 AM~snipped~What should we call an account that was registered in November 2021 but having just a single post till date, trying to promote a project?

comments.author: Argoo
comments.body: Quote from: Mpamaegbu on May 30, 2023, 04:54:20 PMQuote from: Helen005 on May 30, 2023, 09:57:59 AM~snipped~What should we call an account that was registered in November 2021 but having just a single post till date, trying to promote a project? Reasonable remark. I just noticed that this is the OP's first post, and also that it is written in standard phrases from regular advertising without any practical justification.  Now there are a lot of fraudulent projects and therefore you need to calculate and check everything several times before investing in new projects.For now, I prefer to invest in bitcoin, ethereum and a few other top coins.

comments.author: $crypto$
comments.body: Quote from: Helen005 on May 30, 2023, 09:57:59 AMI am going to be super rich in a year just by investing an Oscar token  at 50 percent APY that will be worth hundred dollars after a yearBullshit, how could you possibly be rich within a year? I know this is your trick to promote the project you did to trap many people.I will not believe the words above, only stupid people enter their projects and then invest and hope for high profits, it's not as easy as what is clearly imagined, it's like a ponzi scheme with multiple profits but the facts don't exist.Even with the title you have plunged it.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Quote from: Helen005 on May 30, 2023, 09:57:59 AMI am going to be super rich in a year just by investing an Oscar token  at 50 percent APY that will be worth hundred dollars after a yearAll investors are going to become rich when they buy something, but not everyone puts their plans into practice. The market may have a different opinion on this and what you want from the market, it is not going to do, this happens very often.What makes you think that all investors in oscar token will be paid that 50% APY? Such high returns are more like some kind of pyramid scheme, and your happy post is more like an attempt to schilling another shitcoin with loud promises and prospects.

comments.author: WalkerIVIV
comments.body: you saying investing one dollar and turns it into some hundred dollars honestly just gonna make whatever investment you're mentioning a lot suspicious, also the fact that you kept mentioning APY just make it even worse, isn't if the APY is just 50% at best you could get with 1 dollar investment is just really small returns? i don't think this is good investment.

comments.author: bittick
comments.body: sounds like some fad, moreover arbitrum has history of having some swap platform that turns out to be a scam.so everyone investing should be a lot more careful, observe the smart contract, and observe the behaviour of the swap platform to ensure you're not losing your money.

comments.author: X-ray
comments.body: I dunno how many shill accounts that being owned by shit scam oscar swap but i do believe if what you have done by regularly shilling your oscar swap through varios accounts already destroyed reputation from your platform. It's shitty thing to see that how shillers have bunch of accounts and they were creating the same shit over and over again. What you have said above proves that if you just wanna promote it. Stop moving from one to the another account just to shill your stupid swap service with no user.

comments.author: terciduk123
comments.body: If you want to promote a project at least provide a link about their site, it would be better to add some other important links.The way of marketing by offering very large profits in a short time is very bad marketing, because there is no such thing. in general, those that offer great benefits will end badly

comments.author: isaac_clarke22
comments.body: Sure, let's all join hands with someone that has literally single post and the first post would be promoting a DEX. We could be rich right? What could go wrong right?  That Oscar Token smells like a ponzi scheme just like  Xal0lex mentioned. It's that usual too good to be true scenario. Quote from: terciduk123 on May 31, 2023, 01:04:56 AMIf you want to promote a project at least provide a link about their site, it would be better to add some other important links.The way of marketing by offering very large profits in a short time is very bad marketing, because there is no such thing. in general, those that offer great benefits will end badlyEven with links, I am not going to even bother clicking it. It could be potentially be malicious site. OP just thrown the post in attempt of surely failed exposure for whatever the project is all about.

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: Busted!  I have no idea what oscarswap but chances is that its the same as the previous dex or defi projects. We reached to the peak where innovation is on its height yet meme coin is the most hyped and not Dex.This is a classic hype game of marketers.  He is the only one I see though, some may have post somewhere in many forums. I noiced lately that major forums on the internet already have CRYPTOCURRENCY section odwn their list even when the forum was all about Cars or Webmasters.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Quote from: isaac_clarke22 on May 31, 2023, 03:13:38 AMSure, let's all join hands with someone that has literally single post and the first post would be promoting a DEX. We could be rich right? What could go wrong right?  That Oscar Token smells like a ponzi scheme just like  Xal0lex mentioned. It's that usual too good to be true scenario.That's right, it's shilling another ponzi scheme with promises of high earnings. Such tokens are issued in unreal numbers and each one promises unreal profits. And shillers like OP very rarely write more than 1 post here. Once again, I urge everyone to never believe promises of large interest payouts, especially if it requires locking up your valuable tokens for a long period of time. This most often leads to the fact that at the time of unlocking your coins, the value of tokens is already completely absent and all this time you were earning 50% air.

comments.author: X-ray
comments.body: Your title was making oscar swap looks like a ponzi scheme. LOL  It seems like you have been trying so hard making more and more new accounts just to create a shilling threat for oscar swap. Oscar swap has been running its bounty campaign, told your bounty manager to at least run signature campaign.It will a bit better rather than keep spamming by creating the new account just to promting your suspicious project. I meant think smart. People are very smart these days. You made something wrong and your project will be flagged. I never seen people used this garbage swap. The only swap that was trying to raise funds first before making a product. It's non sense thing for sure.

comments.author: disconnectme
comments.body: The thing about all these Defi projects is how they define yield and where does it come from, as long as supply surpassed demand for a token you are the yield, and you will be worse at the end than the beginning. If 100's of tokens are being created every day and all of them keeps promising yield, then where is this yield come from if not from inflating your tokens. Everything about this project cries foul and I won't bother touch it.

comments.author: wiss19
comments.body: I've been seeing these messages around the forum for some days now and I really feel bad for this swap and its creators, and I wonder how could one be able to run a swap if they don't have the funds to run a proper promotional campaign for their website or service, and they don't even have the courage to come out themselves and announce their project.It takes nothing for a project to have a representative on the forum to announce the project, it is even free and might even earn the swap some customers if they are honest and transparent with everyone unless they are scammers hoping to run away with the funds invested with them.
